title: Judge Dismisses Alexander Vindman’s Lawsuit Against Trump Allies
description: Mr. Vindman, a witness in the first Trump impeachment trial, failed to prove that Donald Trump Jr., Rudolph W. Giuliani and others had engaged in more than “political hackery,” the judge wrote.
dc:creator: Aishvarya Kavi

media:content.media:description: Alexander S. Vindman testifying during impeachment proceedings against President Donald J. Trump in 2019. In his suit, he accused Trump allies of conspiring to intimidate and retaliate against him.
